localize.text: Let me ask you a question.
What would you do if one of your subordinates,
who is harvesting energy from an Abnormality to meet the quota,
ends up facing certain death while doing it?
This is a very basic question, I’m sure you know the right answer.
Harvest energy.
Save the employee.
That's not the perfect answer I expected.
However it is close.
The perfect answer would be to ‘harvest energy before situations like that could arise.’
Lobotomy is an industry giant, and its mission is the top priority.
You did seem to listen to my words.
I expect you to manage your subordinates with that attitude.
It’s so basic to have to remind you.
The manager’s role is to oversee energy production.
You’re not here to take care of the employees.
I didn’t know you were a humanitarian.
Lobotomy is an industry giant, and its mission is the top priority.
It is such a simple question for me, however maybe not for you.
If I were a human,
I would have said,
'How disappointing...'
Do not worry, I will not make said statement.
I am an AI after all.
